jobDetails.subtitle: WHO WE ARE
jobDetails.data: MyEtherWallet is Free, open-source, client-side interface for generating Ethereum wallets & more. We enable our users to interact with the Ethereum blockchain easily & securely. We are looking to hire team players with a desire to learn about the blockchain world and help grow our community.

jobDetails.subtitle: WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR
jobDetails.data: We are looking for a customer service representative with a profound understanding of Blockchain. Our potential candidate must be able to commit full time from 9 am-6pm, as well as be comfortable handling confidential information and must sign a nondisclosure agreement.

jobDetails.subtitle: JOB SUMMARY
jobDetails.data: You as a candidate will provide customer support to users that have questions, concerns or confusion that occur when using our technology. As well as, provide feedback on secure use of online wallets. You must be able to answer support tickets through email, our company’s social media accounts and more. As a candidate you must be prepared to be the voice of the brand, and maintain a strong and good relationship between our clients and our team members. Paid Training is included.

jobDetails.subtitle: KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
data: Communicate with clients through email, Facebook messages, Twitter mentions, Reddit posts and more

Resolve issues by understanding why the client is seeking assistance; determining the cause of the problem; selecting and explaining the best solution for the client's problem; following up to ensure resolution
Provide calm and prompt responses to clients
Being able to recognize and forward complicated support issues to the supervising staff
Manage a large amount of support tickets

jobDetails.subtitle: REQUIREMENTS
data: Be familiar with Blockchain, online wallets
Be able to commit full time
Ability to multitask, prioritize and manage time effectively
Being able to handle sensitive and private information
